sub_title: Senior Integration Consultant at Capgemini Netherlands
summary:
Passionate about solving complex challenges that help make a difference! Keeping myself up to date with the latest trends in tech and working on cutting-edge technologies is a motivator for me. Integration is my expertise and passion both in technology and in my private life. Experience working for different clients and companies in Retail, FSI, E-commerce, Industrial Manufacturing & Logistics industries.

Working with MuleSoft team at Deloitte has sharpened my skills with the cutting-edge integration developments and has given me a good picture of end to end setup of a delivery project. Working in IT for so many clients and industries, has helped me hone my skills of analyzing & managing business relationships in the tech world. With 12 years of IT consultancy, I have worked with various firms and clients in The Netherlands, U.K. and India.

I apply my knowledge in analytics, solutioning and architecture to help organizations achieve digital integration. My passion for latest advancements in IT and my growth mindset helps me adapt to this every changing technology landscape and enables me to provide pragmatic solutions for customer needs. My problem-solving and administrative skills helps me tackle complex problems and improve the way of working. I use my skills of visualizing the overall lifecycle of services for integration of new generation client applications with legacy systems substantiated on interrogations with consumers and service providers.

I am an open and accessible person with a happy and positive attitude. I am highly motivated, used to working independently and a great team player. I have led key initiatives to reduce operating budget for clients by advising and transforming business requirements into technical implementations for developers and testers. 12 years of experience in IT consulting with in-depth understanding of project life-cycles, project development methodologies and tailored agile ceremonies.

Specializations: Mulesoft, Enterprise Architecture, IBM Integration Bus, IBM Websphere Message Broker (Middleware), IBM DataStage (ETL), IBM Datapower, Agile Methodology, Scrum development.

projects.title: eCommerce Integration Framework Project, TNT (Now FedEx), Infosys Limited
projects.description:
Worked in Scrum teams integrating Java services with IIB and IBM Message Broker. Built Broker flows, configured Style sheets for each interfaces and synchronized the services with common architecture.

Technologies/ Frameworks/ Methodologies Used:  	
•	Message Broker 7.5 and IIB9, MQ V 7.5
•	Development and Unit Testing using SOAP, REST, HTTP, etc.
•	Used various messaging domains like XML, XMLNSC, MRM, TDS, etc.
•	Used various protocols and standards including HTTP, MQ, SOAP, REST, WSDL, XSD, etc.
•	Scrum

Key Responsibilities taken:
•	Implemented complex functionalities like local cache and global cache in IIB9 abiding time boxing management.
•	Created MQ objects in WMQ using scripts which included configuring broker queues, WAS activity service server connection channel gateway queues, migration export router queues and global cluster switch queues.
•	Built Broker flows, configured Style sheets (XSLs) for interfaces and synchronized services in common architecture. Designed and developed message flows for Batch and Event based scenarios
•	Developing Message flows utilising the SOAP Input/SOAP Request/SOAP Reply nodes in order to expose services to SOAP based clients
•	Used SOAPUI in order to test Web services deployed to the broker.
•	Created Message Sets using the WSDL provided by the Business Analyst.
•	Assisted in Sprint Planning and burn down reports.
•	Acted as a mentor to new graduates joining the company and aide their development so that they can be utilised on projects. 
•	Coordinated 5 resources, based in two different sites when implementing projects into the production environment.

projects.description:

•	Worked on MB production issues, archiving of log files, giving authority to users, working with other application teams and production implementation.
•	Created Data Power Multi-Protocol Gateway (MPG) services for exposing the Core Services through Data Power.

projects.title: Merchendizing Space Planning, Walmart Inc., Infosys Limited
projects.description:
As a Infosphere DataStage developer developed Complex DataStage Mappings, developed ETL jobs and worked on complete ETL life cycle implementation from requirement gatherings to production implementation.

Technologies/ Frameworks/ Methodologies Used:  	
•	IBM Infospere DataStage 7, 8.5 and 9.1
•	Built DataStage jobs to read files from vendors using Complex Flat File and Sequential File stages.
•	Worked on Cross platform Mainframe jobs and shell scripts for loading data between DB2 tables.
•	Waterfall Method

Key Responsibilities taken:
•	Created Sequencers with Error Handling, Restarting the Jobs and Trigger Email.
•	Worked as a system analyst, dealing closely with clients to establish problem specifications and system designs.
•	Analyzed functional requirements for gaps, high/low level designs.
•	Performed regression and system-level testing to verify software quality and function before it was released.

projects.title: Assortment Management, Walmart Inc., Infosys Limited
projects.description:
Technologies/ Frameworks/ Methodologies Used:  	
•	IBM Infosphere DataStage 8.1 and 9.1
•	Windows Scripts and Windows Scheduler to configure and restart daily and weekly batch flows.

Key Responsibilities taken:
•	Worked in development and production support project. Major responsibilities involved, maintaining and monitoring DataStage flows, handling job abends and rolling out fixes in production support.
•	Worked on JDA BAM tool which displayed the fresh data and historical data used for daily report generations and analysis by clients.
•	Understood and analyzed the business flow of transactions at each level to optimize the total run time and reduce costs (for clients) of running DataStage flows.
•	Acquired understanding of core retail processes of warehouse management and assortment creations.

profile_positions.title: Mulesoft Developer

Worked at Advertising Marketing and Commerce offering as a Srcum Master and Functional Analyst. My team built a E-Commerce Webshop for a Beer Brewing client. Responsibilities involve requirement gathering, effort estimation, backlog creation and facilitating agile ceremonies.
•	Facilitate Sprint Planning, Backlog Grooming, Demo, Release and Retrospective meetings.

•	Work with business owner and product manager to prioritize and validate requirements.
•	Remove team impediments to assist team with delivering sprint goals and deliverables.
profile_positions.title: Consultant, Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
IT consultant with 7 years of experience in analyzing and designing Integration and SOA solutions. As a business analyst in an Agile scrum team, I enabled SOA compliance and APIfication via ESB. Interacted with stakeholders to identify business requirements, advise solutions, discuss architecture agreements with architects of involved parties, translate enterprise architecture designs into Service Solution Architectures, and specifying them as clear requirements to developers and testers.

I use my skills of listening, interrogating and visualizing the complete lifecycle of services for integrating new system with legacy systems. In various processes, I have used my communication skills to convince the end user of the utility to optimize the designs. At ABN AMRO the goal of Enterprise Integration project is to assist SOA compliance by building integration layers on legacy systems via Enterprise Service Bus. My role is to gather business requirements and to design data structures for services on financial transactions. I realize and help develop processes involved for intake, release, deployment, verification and overall lifecycle management of SOA services.

Key technologies:
Sparx Enterprise Architect, IBM Integration Bus, Message Broker (IIB9, IIB10, WMB)
Languages: ESQL, Java, SQL

Relevant experience: 
SOA, Integration, Solution architecture, Enterprise Architecture, Service Analysis, ESB, WebSphere Registry and Repository (WSRR), agile, scrum

Additional Responsibilities:
+ Configured Azure Chat-bot for ABN AMRO enterprise repository.
+ CI/CD pipeline implementation.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst, Integration Specialist & Solutions Designer at ABN AMRO

profile_positions.location: Birmingham, Solihull, Ashby de la zouch, United Kingdom | Hyderabad, Pune, India
profile_positions.description:
Worked with a team of developers through multiple agile software lifecycles. Orchestrated and executed client communication, requirement gathering, ad hoc analysis, user acceptance testing and project planning for Integration projects.

Role in the Scrum team involved identifying and translating application requirements into MQ/MB infrastructure design, implementing the design in all environments and supporting the new infrastructure during Testing and implementation.
Key technologies:
Integration Bus, Message Broker (IIB9, IIB10, WMB), DataPower XI50 and XS40.
Languages: ESQL, Java, SQL

Experience developing complex Message Flows using a combination of MQ Input/Output/Reply, Compute Nodes, Java Compute Nodes, Mapping Nodes, Aggregation, RouteToLabel, HTTP Input/Reply/Request, SOAP Input/Reply/Request, FileInput, FileOutput, Collector Node, Timeout Notification node, Oracle Stored Procedure calls, XML parsing, complex Error Handling modules.
